Member Function Documentation

Glib::RefPtr<RcStyle> Gtk::RcStyle::copy ( ) const

Makes a copy of the specified Gtk::RcStyle.

This function will correctly copy an RC style that is a member of a class derived from Gtk::RcStyle.

Returns:
The resulting Gtk::RcStyle.

Glib::RefPtr< Gtk::RcStyle > wrap ( GtkRcStyle *  object,
bool  take_copy = false 
) [related]

A Glib::wrap() method for this object.

Parameters:
objectThe C instance.
take_copyFalse if the result should take ownership of the C instance. True if it should take a new copy or ref.
Returns:
A C++ instance that wraps this C instance.
